thread.section_title: Munchery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Munchery | www.munchery.com
thread.title: SHIRLEEN BECKER

author: SHIRLEEN BECKER
title: SHIRLEEN BECKER
text: The burger meat was huge and delicious; fresh, crispy lettuce, firm tomato and onion slices. The bacon crisped perfectly when microwaved. Very good bun; did not become soggy. Also, important to us, the meat was flavored perfectly, not too salty. When I thought we might have been forgotten in delivery, I was able to contact someone who was able to tell me that our food was just ten minutes away. Very courteous delivery man. I do wish the delivery time could be within one hour rather than two (5-6 or 6-7 instead of 5-7). It's hard to wait that long when you're hungry. This was a very satisfying experience!
